sentences.sContent: The Lord again dipped into the river. He held out a golden thimble studded with rubies.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Lord again dipped into the river. He held out a golden thimble studded with rubies.
sentences.sCn: 上帝又把手伸进河里，捞出一个镶嵌着红宝石的金顶针。

sentences.sContent: Etymology can only ask why a small cuplike guard used in sewing is called a thimble, though it is put on the third finger.
sentences.sContent_eng: Etymology can only ask why a small cuplike guard used in sewing is called a thimble, though it is put on the third finger.
sentences.sCn: 词源学只能问，为什么缝纫时使用的一个小杯状装置被称为顶针，但它却是在中指上使用的。

trans.tranOther: a small metal or plastic cap used to protect your finger when you are sewing
